title: Love, Inc.
details:
Love In the Name of Christ (Love INC) exists for the purpose of connecting volunteers from local churches to people with needs in the community. 

Join the ranks of volunteers from Northwest Hills who are willing to help people of our community who have unmet needs. 

You can serve in many ways from reading to someone, changing a light bulb, or providing a ride to a doctor's appointment. 

Redemption Church partners with Love INC to provide food to families and individuals in need. 

You can sign up to help deliver food boxes to a family.

title: College Hill High School
details:
Their purpose is to help each student develop a framework of accountability that promotes learning and inspires courage to invest in the future. 

Their staff will empower students by providing superior learning opportunities in a unique and exceptional environment. 

You can volunteer to mentor students, help in the classroom or be part of our work projects around the school.

title: Homeless Ministry
details:
Each Saturday a team heads downtown to deliver lunches. 

We are able to meet a physical need while engaging in conversations, sharing Jesus and praying for those we meet. 

You can help by making lunches on Fridays at the church or volunteering to serve on a Saturday.

title: Mosaic College Ministry
details:
Corvallis is a home away from home for thousands of students attending Oregon State University or Linn-Benton Community College. 

That presents a great opportunity for us to share the love of Christ with young adults trying to decide who they want to be and how to prepare for their future. 

These are crucial years for determining whether or not God will be a part of their life now and in the years to come. Our college ministry is called MOSAIC. 

We meet weekly on campus on Thursday nights at 7:30 pm in the Memorial Union. 

We also offer many small groups meeting on or around campus throughout the week. We would love for you to check out all that happens at Mosaic! 

If you would like more information about our college group, follow the link below to our webpage!

title: The Most Excellent Way
details:
The Most Excellent Way ministers to both men and women desiring to break free from addiction - whether that be drugs, alcohol, gambling, pornography or any other self-centered, life-destroying addiction. 

This is the place to come experience true life change. 

This group meets every Monday at 7 PM at Redemption Church. The men meet in the gym and the women meet in the sanctuary. There is also programs for children available during the meeting.
